alert.note: Alert for Hardin; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern McNairy and northwestern Hardin Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 100 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Adamsville, or 10 miles northeast of Selmer, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Savannah, Adamsville, Morris Chapel, Crump, Bethel Springs, Milledgeville, Enville, Forty Forks, Good Hope, Right, Phillips, Old Lawton, Walkertown, Purdy, Cerro Gordo, Hickory Flats, Mount Vinson, New Lawton, Martin Camp and Sibley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
